name: Domino Dash (Axel Ward)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move Character

Right Click - Place/Remove Domino

Scroll - Turn Domino

Space - Switch between racing and placement

Esc - Menu

--------

This project was developed to explore Unity, and become familiar with the way that Unity objects function and interact. All code and models were created by Axel Ward, with some issues being solved by viewing code on various forum threads.

Website: https://www.axelward.com/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7Z8ozJbNt8k6MM_8zSanzQ
